## WorldEventPayloads."WORLD.SET\_FOG\_COLOR" property

Emitted when the color of the world's fog is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[WorldEvent.SET_FOG_COLOR]: {
        world: World;
        color: RgbColor;
    };
```
